title: Specialist
body: Helps the customer find the right product for their needs. Then, they can help the customer set it up.

title: Business Expert
body: Helps business professionals and entrepreneurs find products they need and assist them with configurating the products that their business uses.

title: Technical Specialist
body: Helps device owners get started with and troubleshoot their mobile devices.

title: Creative
body: Uses their knowledge of Apple devices to help people use their device and imagination to create. They have a background in the liberal arts.

title: Creative Pro
body: Creative Pros lead Today At Apple sessions and show the creative uses of Apple products and services. They are experts in a creative field.

title: Genius
body: Helps customers with technical issues and works to repair devices.

title: Manager
body: Leads a team of store employees and helps customers with escalated issues.
